meanings.definition: Childes: the plural form of child
meanings.sent1: In the park, I saw many childes playing together.
meanings.sent2: The school is full of childes eager to learn.
meanings.sent3: The childes giggled as they ran around the playground.
meanings.sent4: The room echoed with the laughter of the childes.
meanings.sent5: The childes' innocence and joy brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: Childes: belonging to or characteristic of a child
meanings.sent1: The small chair is perfect for childes to sit on.
meanings.sent2: Her childes laughter filled the room with happiness.
meanings.sent3: The childes artwork on the fridge always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: His childes behavior reminded me of my own childhood.
meanings.sent5: The childes voice was filled with excitement and wonder.
